nodes.text: The Torragan Mountains were a mountain range located over two thousand kilometers away to the southeast of the Shakamm Crater on the planet Aurea. It was the location of the Dome of Crystal Fire, a protected cave deep below the mountains containing burning crystals. The Eternal Furnace, a giant lava pool used by the Aurean Glassworkers Guild for their most audacious and important projects, was also located in the mountains.
